title: Baratza Kafea
typeOfFood: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine
description: Vegan, macrobiotic and bio menu on weekdays with different options. Vegan dishes, macrobiotic dish of the day, a variety of starts, salads and desserts. Gluten free food available. Also offers snacks, cakes and pies, a selection of teas, grain coffee, natural juices and smoothies. Wi-fi. Also has a natural cooking school offering weekly workshops and other activities.
